name: Ultimate Waiting Game Championship
description:
A digital recreation of a competition as old as time itself: staring at each other until someone dies. Test the limits of your boredom as you face off with a friend in local multiplayer, or against a cavalcade of formidable foes in story mode as you and your opponents take patience to the next level!

Hit me up on twitter for updates on future projects / garbage!

@beetosu

Questions? Comments? Concerns? Feel free to contact me at:
